briefTitle: Liposomal Bupivacaine at Cesarean Delivery to Decrease Post-operative Pain

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score With Activity
outcomeMeasures.description:
Pain score with activity. PAIN OUT scale, which is a 0-10 scale, where 10 is more pain.

2 patients in the liposomal bupivacaine group were discharged prior to 48 hour assessment, therefore denominator for this outcome is 37, not 39

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score With Activity
outcomeMeasures.description:
Pain score with activity. PAIN OUT scale, which is a 0-10 scale, where 10 is more pain.

4 patients in the placebo group and 7 patients in the liposomal bupivacaine group were discharged prior to the 72 hour assessment

outcomeMeasures.title: Satisfaction With Post-operative Pain Control
outcomeMeasures.description: PAIN OUT Tool, 0-10 scale, where 0 is not satisfied and 10 is satisfied

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Patients With Wound Complication - Separation, Dehiscence, Infection
Number of Patients With Allergic Reaction Attributable to Local Anesthestic
Patient Satisfaction With Pain Management at 6w Postpartum
outcomeMeasures.description: Phone follow up to ascertain satisfaction with pain control, Likert 5 point scale used
